Package javelin.view.frame

Class Frame

  • java.lang.Object
    • javelin.view.frame.Frame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    KeysScreen, TextScreen
    public abstract class Frame
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an AWT window.
    Author:
    alex

      • addaction

        protected void addaction​(int key,
                         javax.swing.AbstractAction action)
        Parameters:
        key - Key to be associated with this event. For example: KeyEvent.VK_ENTER.
        action - Action to perform.

      • enter

        protected void enter()
        Called when ENTER is pressed. By default closes the frame;

      • escape

        protected void escape()
        Called when ESCAPE is pressed. By default closes the frame;

      • position

        Parameters:
        frame - Positions this frame in relation to the screen.
        See Also:

        Open dialog.

      • generate

        protected abstract java.awt.Container generate()
        Returns:
        the content pane.

      • getscreensize

        public static java.awt.Dimension getscreensize()
        Returns:
        The screen size.

      • getdialogsize

        public static java.awt.Dimension getdialogsize()
        Returns:
        Hopefully a decent size suggestion for Frames and controls.

      • defer

        public void defer()
        Sleeps this thread until frame is closed. Useful when calling from main thread, if calling from UI thread consider block(Frame) instead.

      • block

        protected void block​(Frame modal)
        Hides this window until this other Frame is closed.
        See Also:
        defer()

      • show

        public void show​(Frame parent)
        Parameters:
        parent - Like show() but also blocks the parent frame.
        See Also:
        block(Frame)
